trans-unit.source: Typically, only one master Compiler instance is created, although child compilers can be created in order to delegate specific tasks. The Compiler is ultimately just a function which performs bare minimum functionality to keep a lifecycle running. It delegates all the loading, bundling, and writing work to registered plugins.
trans-unit.target: 通常，仅创建一个主 Compiler 实例，尽管可以创建子编译器以委派特定任务。所述 Compiler 是最终只执行最低限度的功能，以保持一个生命周期运行的功能。它将所有加载，捆绑和写入工作委托给注册的插件。

trans-unit.source: Use cache option in webpack configuration. Clear cache directory on "postinstall" in package.json.
trans-unit.target: 在webpack配置中使用 cache 选项。在清除缓存目录 "postinstall" 中 package.json 。

trans-unit.source: Use webpack-cli's init command to rapidly generate webpack configuration file for your project requirements, it will ask you a couple of questions before creating a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 使用webpack-cli的 init 命令快速生成适合您项目需求的webpack配置文件，它将在创建配置文件之前询问您几个问题。

trans-unit.source: Use <script type="module" src="es6_out_path.js"> to target modern browsers and <script nomodule src="es5_out_path.js"> for older browsers.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <script type="module" src="es6_out_path.js"> 定位现代浏览器，使用 <script nomodule src="es5_out_path.js"> 用于较旧的浏览器。

trans-unit.source: Use 'ws' mode:
trans-unit.target: 使用 'ws' 模式：

trans-unit.source: Use --conditions CLI argument.
trans-unit.target: 使用 --conditions CLI参数。

trans-unit.source: Use CommonsChunkPlugin to create bundles of shared application code between each page. Multi-page applications that reuse a lot of code/modules between entry points can greatly benefit from these techniques, as the amount of entry points increase.
trans-unit.target: 使用 CommonsChunkPlugin 在每个页面之间创建共享应用程序代码包。随着入口点数量的增加，在入口点之间重用大量代码/模块的多页面应用程序可以从这些技术中受益匪浅。

trans-unit.source: Use exportConditions option for @rollup/plugin-node-resolve
trans-unit.target: 对 @rollup/plugin-node-resolve 使用 exportConditions 选项

trans-unit.source: Use module.rules whenever possible, as this will reduce boilerplate in your source code and allow you to debug or locate a loader faster if something goes south.
trans-unit.target: 尽可能使用 module.rules ，因为这会减少源代码中的样板，并且如果出现问题，可让您更快地调试或定位装载程序。

trans-unit.source: Use resolve.conditionNames configuration option.
trans-unit.target: 使用 resolve.conditionNames 配置选项。

trans-unit.source: Use webpack [command] [entries...] [option] syntax because some options can accept multiple values so webpack --target node ./entry.js means target: ['node', './file.js']
trans-unit.target: 使用 webpack [command] [entries...] [option] 语法，因为某些选项可以接受多个值，因此 webpack --target node ./entry.js 表示 target: ['node', './file.js']

trans-unit.target: 使用案例。Git版本

trans-unit.target: 使用ES模块语法

trans-unit.target: 使用ES模块语法。

trans-unit.source: Use ES2015 module syntax (i.e. import and export).
trans-unit.target: 使用ES2015模块语法（即 import 和 export ）。

trans-unit.source: Use a eval-source-map variant for incremental builds.
trans-unit.target: 使用 eval-source-map 变体进行增量构建。

trans-unit.source: Use a different service URL in production/development builds:
trans-unit.target: 在生产/开发构建中使用不同的服务URL。

trans-unit.source: Use a value of Infinity to process all assets even if they are larger than the original size or their original size is 0 bytes (useful when you are pre-zipping all assets for AWS).
trans-unit.target: 即使资产大于原始大小或原始大小为 0 字节，也可以使用 Infinity 值来处理所有资产（在为AWS预压缩所有资产时很有用）。

trans-unit.source: Use a value of Number.MAX_SAFE_INTEGER to process all assets even if they are larger than the original size, excluding assets with their original size is 0 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Number.MAX_SAFE_INTEGER 的值来处理所有资产，即使它们大于原始大小，也不包括原始大小为 0 字节的资产。

trans-unit.source: Use an object to pass options through to Less.
trans-unit.target: 使用对象将选项传递给Less。

trans-unit.source: Use an object to pass options through to Stylus.
trans-unit.target: 使用对象将选项传递给Stylus。

trans-unit.source: Use and object for the Sass implementation setup.
trans-unit.target: Sass实现设置的使用和对象。

trans-unit.target: 使用不同的配置文件

trans-unit.source: Use different configuration file
trans-unit.target: 使用不同的配置文件

trans-unit.source: Use fewer/smaller libraries.
trans-unit.target: 使用较少/较小的图书馆。

trans-unit.source: Use it beforecss-loader and style-loader, but after other preprocessor loaders like e.g sass|less|stylus-loader, if you use any (since webpack loaders evaluate right to left/bottom to top).
trans-unit.target: 如果要使用它，则在 css-loader 和 style-loader 之前使用它，但在其他预处理程序加载器（例如 sass|less|stylus-loader 使用（因为webpack加载器从右到左/从上到下评估）。

trans-unit.source: Use modules without having to use import/require
trans-unit.target: 使用模块,而不必使用导入/需求。

trans-unit.source: Use multi-process parallel running to improve the build speed
trans-unit.target: 使用多进程并行运行,提高构建速度。

trans-unit.source: Use multi-process parallel running to improve the build speed. Default number of concurrent runs: os.cpus().length - 1.
trans-unit.target: 使用多进程并行运行可提高构建速度。并发运行的默认数量： os.cpus().length - 1 。

trans-unit.source: Use of HtmlWebpackPlugin
trans-unit.target: 使用HtmlWebpackPlugin

trans-unit.source: Use source maps to map error message locations to modules (This slows down the compilation) ⚠️ cheap-source-map options don't work with this plugin
trans-unit.target: 使用源映射将错误消息位置映射到模块（这会减慢编译速度）⚠️cheap cheap-source-map 选项不适用于此插件

trans-unit.source: Use source maps to map error message locations to modules (this slows down the compilation). If you use your own minify function please read the minify section for handling source maps correctly.
trans-unit.target: 使用源映射将错误消息位置映射到模块（这会减慢编译速度）。如果您使用自己的 minify 功能，请阅读 minify 部分以正确处理源地图。

trans-unit.source: Use sourcemaps
trans-unit.target: 使用源码图

trans-unit.source: Use the productionmode configuration option to enable various optimizations including minification and tree shaking.
trans-unit.target: 使用 production mode 配置选项可以启用各种优化，包括最小化和摇树。

trans-unit.source: Use the exports-loader to add a module export to components which expect a symbol to be global.
trans-unit.target: 使用exports-loader将模块导出添加到期望符号为全局符号的组件。

trans-unit.source: Use the imports-loader when a script expects the this keyword to reference window.
trans-unit.target: 当脚本希望 this 关键字引用 window 时，请使用imports-loader。

trans-unit.source: Use the ProvidePlugin to add a module import statement when a script expects a variable to be globally defined (but is now a module export).
trans-unit.target: 当脚本期望全局定义变量（但现在是模块导出）时，请使用ProvidePlugin添加模块导入语句。

trans-unit.source: Use the NormalModuleReplacementPlugin to have webpack swap a module-compliant version for a script.
trans-unit.target: 使用NormalModuleReplacementPlugin使Webpack交换脚本的模块兼容版本。

trans-unit.source: Use the SourceMapDevToolPlugin for a more fine grained configuration. See the source-map-loader to deal with existing source maps.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SourceMapDevToolPlugin 获得更细粒度的配置。请参阅 source-map-loader 处理现有的源地图。

trans-unit.source: Use the css-loader or the raw-loader to turn it into a JS module and the MiniCssExtractPlugin to extract it into a separate file. Looking for the webpack 1 loader? Check out the archive/webpack-1 branch.
trans-unit.target: 使用css-loader或raw-loader将其转换为JS模块，并使用MiniCssExtractPlugin将其提取为单独的文件。寻找webpack 1装载机吗？检出archive / webpack-1分支。

trans-unit.source: Use the getOptions method from loader-utils to extract given loader options.
trans-unit.target: 使用 getOptions 方法从 loader-utils 提取给出加载程序选项。

trans-unit.source: Use the StatsPlugin for more control over the generated profile.
trans-unit.target: 使用StatsPlugin对生成的配置文件进行更多控制。

trans-unit.source: Use the CommonsChunkPlugin in async mode in Multi-Page Applications.
trans-unit.target: 在多页面应用程序中以 async 模式使用 CommonsChunkPlugin 。

trans-unit.source: Use the CommonsChunkPlugin in Multi-Page Applications.
trans-unit.target: 在多页面应用程序中使用 CommonsChunkPlugin 。

trans-unit.source: Use the DllPlugin to move code that is changed less often into a separate compilation. This will improve the application's compilation speed, although it does increase complexity of the build process.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DllPlugin 将更改较少的代码移动到单独的编译中。尽管这确实会增加构建过程的复杂性，但这将提高应用程序的编译速度。

trans-unit.source: Use the SplitChunksPlugin in async mode in Multi-Page Applications.
trans-unit.target: 在多页面应用程序中以 async 模式使用 SplitChunksPlugin 。

trans-unit.source: Use the SplitChunksPlugin in Multi-Page Applications.
trans-unit.target: 在多页面应用程序中使用 SplitChunksPlugin 。

trans-unit.source: Use the fork-ts-checker-webpack-plugin for type checking in a separate process.
trans-unit.target: 使用 fork-ts-checker-webpack-plugin 在单独的进程中进行类型检查。

trans-unit.source: Use the fork-ts-checker-webpack-plugin for typechecking in a separate process.
trans-unit.target: 使用 fork-ts-checker-webpack-plugin 在单独的过程中进行类型检查。

trans-unit.source: Use the include field to only apply the loader modules that actually need to be transformed by it:
trans-unit.target: 使用 include 字段仅应用实际需要由其转换的加载器模块：

trans-unit.source: Use the optimization.emitOnErrors to emit assets whenever there are errors while compiling. This ensures that erroring assets are emitted. Critical errors are emitted into the generated code and will cause errors at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 编译时出现错误时，请使用 optimization.emitOnErrors 发出资产。这样可以确保发出错误的资产。严重错误会发出到生成的代码中，并会在运行时导致错误。

trans-unit.source: Use the optimization.noEmitOnErrors to skip the emitting phase whenever there are errors while compiling. This ensures that no erroring assets are emitted. The emitted flag in the stats is false for all assets.
trans-unit.target: 编译时出现错误时，请使用 optimization.noEmitOnErrors 跳过发射阶段。这样可以确保不会发出错误的资产。该 emitted 的统计标志是 false 的所有资产。

trans-unit.source: Use the output option to change the filenames of specific plugin instances.
trans-unit.target: 使用 output 选项来更改特定插件实例的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Use the ts-loader in happyPackMode: true / transpileOnly: true.
trans-unit.target: 在 happyPackMode: true / transpileOnly: true 使用 ts-loader 。

trans-unit.source: Use the correct separators. I.e. path.resolve(__dirname, "app/folder") or path.join(__dirname, "app", "folder").
trans-unit.target: 使用正确的分隔符。即 path.resolve(__dirname, "app/folder") 或 path.join(__dirname, "app", "folder") 。

trans-unit.source: Using maxSize (either globally optimization.splitChunks.maxSize per cache group optimization.splitChunks.cacheGroups[x].maxSize or for the fallback cache group optimization.splitChunks.fallbackCacheGroup.maxSize) tells webpack to try to split chunks bigger than maxSize bytes into smaller parts. Parts will be at least minSize (next to maxSize) in size. The algorithm is deterministic and changes to the modules will only have local impact. So that it is usable when using long term caching and doesn't require records. maxSize is only a hint and could be violated when modules are bigger than maxSize or splitting would violate minSize.
trans-unit.target: 使用 maxSize （无论是全球 optimization.splitChunks.maxSize 每个高速缓存组 optimization.splitChunks.cacheGroups[x].maxSize 或回退缓存组 optimization.splitChunks.fallbackCacheGroup.maxSize ）讲述的WebPack尝试分割块大于 maxSize 字节成更小的部分。零件的大小至少应为 minSize （在 maxSize 之后）。该算法是确定性的，对模块的更改只会产生局部影响。这样，在使用长期缓存时就可以使用它并且不需要记录。 maxSize 只是一个提示，当模块大于 maxSize 时可能会被违反或拆分会违反 minSize 。

trans-unit.source: Using maxSize (either globally optimization.splitChunks.maxSize per cache group optimization.splitChunks.cacheGroups[x].maxSize or for the fallback cache group optimization.splitChunks.fallbackCacheGroup.maxSize) tells webpack to try to split chunks bigger than maxSize into smaller parts. Parts will be at least minSize (next to maxSize) in size. The algorithm is deterministic and changes to the modules will only have local impact. So that it is usable when using long term caching and doesn't require records. maxSize is only a hint and could be violated when modules are bigger than maxSize or splitting would violate minSize.
trans-unit.target: 使用 maxSize （无论是全球 optimization.splitChunks.maxSize 每个高速缓存组 optimization.splitChunks.cacheGroups[x].maxSize 或回退缓存组 optimization.splitChunks.fallbackCacheGroup.maxSize ）讲述的WebPack尝试分割块比更大 maxSize 成较小的部分。部件的大小至少应为 minSize （在 maxSize 之后）。该算法是确定性的，对模块的更改只会产生局部影响。这样，在使用长期缓存时就可以使用它并且不需要记录。 maxSize 只是一个提示，当模块大于 maxSize 时可能会被违反或拆分会违反 minSize 。

trans-unit.source: Using ~ is deprecated and can be removed from your code (we recommend it), but we still support it for historical reasons. Why you can removed it? The loader will first try to resolve @import as relative, if it cannot be resolved, the loader will try to resolve @import inside node_modules. Just prepend them with a ~ which tells webpack to look up the modules.
trans-unit.target: 不建议使用 ~ ，并且可以从您的代码中删除它（我们建议使用），但出于历史原因，我们仍然支持它。为什么可以删除它？加载程序将首先尝试将 @import 解析为相对的，如果无法解析，则加载程序将尝试在 node_modules 内部解析 @import 。只需在它们前面加上 ~ 告诉webpack查找 modules 。

trans-unit.source: Using ~ is deprecated and can be removed from your code (we recommend it), but we still support it for historical reasons. Why you can removed it? The loader will first try to resolve @import/@require as relative, if it cannot be resolved, the loader will try to resolve @import/@require inside node_modules. Just prepend them with a ~ which tells webpack to look up the modules.
trans-unit.target: 不建议使用 ~ ，并且可以从您的代码中删除它（我们建议使用），但出于历史原因，我们仍然支持它。为什么可以删除它？加载程序将首先尝试将 @import / @require 解析为相对的，如果无法解析，则加载程序将尝试在 @require 内部解析 @import / node_modules 。只需在它们前面加上 ~ 告诉webpack查找 modules 。

trans-unit.source: We distinguish between local and remote modules. Local modules are normal modules which are part of the current build. Remote modules are modules that are not part of the current build and loaded from a so-called container at the runtime.
trans-unit.target: 我们将模块区分为本地模块和远程模块。本地模块是普通模块,是当前构建的一部分。远程模块是不属于当前构建的模块,在运行时从所谓的容器中加载。

trans-unit.source: We made the Vagrant box accessible from a static IP, and then made webpack-dev-server publicly accessible so it is reachable from a browser. We then tackled a common problem that VirtualBox doesn't send out filesystem events, causing the server to not reload on file changes.
trans-unit.target: 我们使Vagrant框可从静态IP访问，然后使 webpack-dev-server 可公开访问，以便可从浏览器访问它。然后，我们解决了一个常见的问题，即VirtualBox不会发送文件系统事件，从而导致服务器无法在文件更改时重新加载。

trans-unit.source: We made the Vagrant box accessible from a static IP, and then made webpack-dev-server publicly accessible so it is reachable from a browser. We then tackled a common problem that VirtualBox doesn't send out filesystem events, causing the server to not reload on file changes.
trans-unit.target: 我们让Vagrant盒子可以通过静态IP访问,然后让webpack-dev-server可以公开访问,这样就可以通过浏览器访问。然后我们解决了一个常见的问题,即VirtualBox不发送文件系统事件,导致服务器在文件变化时不重载。

trans-unit.source: We prefer static detection of production/development mode via the production or development condition.
trans-unit.target: 我们更喜欢通过 production 或 development 条件对生产/开发模式进行静态检测。

trans-unit.source: We recommend do not specify from, to and map options, because this can lead to wrong path in source maps. If you need source maps please use the sourcemap option.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议不要指定 from ， to 和 map 选项，因为这可能导致源映射中的路径错误。如果您需要源地图，请使用 sourcemap 选项。

trans-unit.source: We recommend use prefix v- for values, s- for selectors and m- for media at-rules.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议对值使用前缀 v- ，对于选择器使用 s- ，对于媒体规则使用 m- 。

trans-unit.source: We recommend using percentBy: 'entries' setting for projects with multiple configured entry points. Percentage calculation will become more accurate because the amount of entry points is known in advance.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议对具有多个已配置入口点的项目使用 percentBy: 'entries' 设置。百分比计算将变得更加准确，因为提前知道了入口点的数量。

trans-unit.source: We recommend using DllPlugin only with entryOnly: true, otherwise tree shaking in the DLL won't work as all the exports might be used.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议仅将DllPlugin与 entryOnly: true ，否则DLL中的树状摇动将不起作用，因为可能会使用所有导出。

trans-unit.source: We strongly recommend using an asynchronous boundary. It will split out the initialization code of a larger chunk to avoid any additional round trips and improve performance in general.
trans-unit.target: 我们强烈建议使用异步边界。它将分割出一个较大块的初始化代码,以避免任何额外的往返,并在总体上提高性能。

trans-unit.source: Webpack is capable of adding nonce to all scripts that it loads. To activate the feature set a __webpack_nonce__ variable needs to be included in your entry script. A unique hash based nonce should be generated and provided for each unique page view this is why __webpack_nonce__ is specified in the entry file and not in the configuration. Please note that nonce should always be a base64-encoded string.
trans-unit.target: Webpack能够将 nonce 添加到它加载的所有脚本中。要激活功能集，需要在您的输入脚本中包含 __webpack_nonce__ 变量。应该生成一个基于哈希的唯一随机数，并为每个唯一的页面视图提供该随机数，这就是为什么在条目文件中而不是在配置中指定 __webpack_nonce__ 的原因。请注意， nonce 应始终为base64编码的字符串。

trans-unit.source: When devServer.lazy is enabled, the dev-server will only compile the bundle when it gets requested. This means that webpack will not watch any file changes. We call this lazy mode.
trans-unit.target: 当 devServer.lazy 启用，当它被请求的DEV-服务器将只编译软件包。这意味着webpack将不会监视任何文件更改。我们称这种懒惰模式。

trans-unit.source: When invalidate is called, the dispose handler will be eventually called and fill module.hot.data. If dispose handler is not registered, an empty object will be supplied to module.hot.data.
trans-unit.target: 当 invalidate 被调用， dispose 处理器将最终被称为和填充 module.hot.data 。如果未注册 dispose 程序，则将向 module.hot.data 提供一个空对象。

trans-unit.source: When lazy is enabled, the dev-server will only compile the bundle when it gets requested. This means that webpack will not watch any file changes. We call this lazy mode.
trans-unit.target: 当 lazy 使能时，它就会要求DEV-服务器将只编译软件包。这意味着webpack将不会监视任何文件更改。我们称这种懒惰模式。

trans-unit.target: 当Node.js发布后,一个新的时代开始了,它也带来了新的挑战。现在JavaScript已经不在浏览器中运行了,Node应用程序应该如何加载新的代码块?没有html文件和脚本标签可以加进去。

trans-unit.source: When a matchResource is set, it will be used to match with the module.rules instead of the original resource. This can be useful if further loaders should be applied to the resource, or if the module type needs to be changed. It's also displayed in the stats and used for matching Rule.issuer and test in splitChunks.
trans-unit.target: 当 matchResource 设置，它将被用来匹配的 module.rules 而不是原始资源。如果应该将更多的加载程序应用于资源，或者需要更改模块类型，这将很有用。它也显示在统计信息中，用于匹配 Rule.issuer 和在 splitChunks 中进行 test 。

trans-unit.source: When a function is given, returning true tells webpack to inject the module into the bundle as Base64-encoded string, otherwise module file will be emitted into the output directory.
trans-unit.target: 给定一个函数时，返回 true 指示webpack将模块作为Base64编码的字符串注入到包中，否则模块文件将被发送到输出目录中。

trans-unit.source: When a page which uses the ChartComponent is requested, the charting-library-chunk is also requested via <link rel="preload">. Assuming the page-chunk is smaller and finishes faster, the page will be displayed with a LoadingIndicator, until the already requested charting-library-chunk finishes. This will give a little load time boost since it only needs one round-trip instead of two. Especially in high-latency environments.
trans-unit.target: 当请求使用 ChartComponent 的页面时，还可以通过 <link rel="preload"> 来请求charting -library-chunk 。假设页面块较小并且完成得更快，该页面将显示一个 LoadingIndicator ，直到已经请求的 charting-library-chunk 完成为止。这将增加一点加载时间，因为它只需要一个往返而不是两个。特别是在高延迟环境中。

trans-unit.source: When assigning equal names to different split chunks, all vendor modules are placed into a single shared chunk, though it's not recommend since it can result in more code downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 当给不同的拆分块分配相等的名称时,所有的厂商模块都会被放入一个共享的块中,不过不建议这样做,因为这会导致下载更多的代码。

trans-unit.source: When called during the check state, this module will be added to the update when an update is available. If no update is available it will create a new update. HMR will enter the ready state.

trans-unit.source: When called during the idle state, a new HMR update will be created containing this module. HMR will enter the ready state.

trans-unit.source: When creating a bundle with this configuration, console.log(footer) will output 'default footer'. Let's set Rule.resolve for .js files, and alias footer to overridden.js.
trans-unit.target: 使用此配置创建捆绑软件时， console.log(footer) 将输出“默认页脚”。让我们设置 Rule.resolve 对 .js 文件和别名 footer 到 overridden.js 。

trans-unit.source: When creating a bundle with updated configuration, console.log(footer) will output 'overridden footer'.
trans-unit.target: 创建具有更新配置的捆绑软件时， console.log(footer) 将输出“ overrided footer”。

trans-unit.source: When declaring a local classname you can compose a local class from another local classname.
trans-unit.target: 当声明一个本地类名时,你可以从另一个本地类名组成一个本地类。

trans-unit.source: When defining values for process prefer 'process.env.NODE_ENV': JSON.stringify('production') over process: { env: { NODE_ENV: JSON.stringify('production') } }. Using the latter will overwrite the process object which can break compatibility with some modules that expect other values on the process object to be defined.
trans-unit.target: 在为 process 定义值时，最好使用 'process.env.NODE_ENV': JSON.stringify('production') 不是 process: { env: { NODE_ENV: JSON.stringify('production') } } 。使用后者将覆盖 process 对象，这可能会破坏与期望在过程对象上定义其他值的某些模块的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: When developing a plugin for webpack, you might want to know where each hook is called. To learn this, search for hooks.<hook name>.call across the webpack source
trans-unit.target: 在为webpack开发插件时，您可能想知道每个钩子的调用位置。要了解这一点，请在Webpack源代码中搜索 hooks.<hook name>.call .call

trans-unit.source: When enabled, symlinked resources are resolved to their real path, not their symlinked location. Note that this may cause module resolution to fail when using tools that symlink packages (like npm link).
trans-unit.target: 启用后，符号链接的资源将解析到其实际路径，而不是符号链接的位置。请注意，当使用符号链接软件包的工具（例如 npm link ）时，这可能导致模块解析失败。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, webpack will set output.iife to false, output.scriptType to 'module' and terserOptions.module to true internally.
trans-unit.target: 启用后，将的WebPack设置 output.iife 到 false ， output.scriptType 到 'module' 和 terserOptions.module 到 true 内部。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, webpack would prefer to resolve module requests as relative requests instead of using modules from node_modules directories.
trans-unit.target: 启用后，webpack宁愿将模块请求解析为相对请求，而不是使用 node_modules 目录中的模块。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, you should provide the file extension when importing a module in .mjs files or any other .js files when their nearest parent package.json file contains a "type" field with a value of "module", otherwise webpack would fail the compiling with a Module not found error. And webpack won't resolve directories with filenames defined in the resolve.mainFiles, you have to specify the filename yourself.
trans-unit.target: 启用后，当其最接近的父 package.json 文件包含 "type" 字段且值为 "module" ，在 .mjs 文件或任何其他 .js 文件中 import 模块时，应提供文件扩展名，否则webpack将会失败使用“ Module not found 错误进行编译。和的WebPack并不能解决在定义文件名目录 resolve.mainFiles ，你必须自己指定文件名。

trans-unit.source: When files paths are processed by webpack, they always contain / on Unix systems and \ on Windows. That's why using [\\/] in {cacheGroup}.test fields is necessary to represent a path separator. / or \ in {cacheGroup}.test will cause issues when used cross-platform.
trans-unit.target: 当webpack处理文件路径时，它们在Unix系统上始终包含 / ，在Windows上始终包含 \ 。因此，必须在 {cacheGroup}.test 字段中使用 [\\/] 来表示路径分隔符。在跨平台使用时， {cacheGroup}.test 中的 / 或 \ 将导致问题。

trans-unit.source: When installing a package that will be bundled into your production bundle, you should use npm install --save. trans-unit.source: When loading code with HTML <script> tags, the webpack runtime will try to find an existing <script> tag that matches the src attribute or has a specific data-webpack attribute. trans-unit.source: When using the uglifyjs-webpack-plugin you must provide the sourceMap: true option to enable SourceMap support.
trans-unit.target: 使用 uglifyjs-webpack-plugin 时，必须提供 sourceMap: true 选项以启用SourceMap支持。

trans-unit.source: When using the JetBrains WebStorm IDE, you may find that saving changed files does not trigger the watcher as you might expect. Try disabling the safe write option in the settings, which determines whether files are saved to a temporary location first before the originals are overwritten: uncheck File > Settings... > System Settings > Use "safe write" (save changes to a temporary file first).
trans-unit.target: 使用JetBrains WebStorm IDE时，您可能会发现保存更改的文件不会像您期望的那样触发观察程序。尝试在设置中禁用 safe write 选项，该选项确定是否在覆盖原始 File > Settings... > System Settings > Use "safe write" (save changes to a temporary file first) 之前先将文件保存到临时位置：取消选中文件>设置...>系统设置>使用“安全写入”（将更改保存到临时文件）首先）。

trans-unit.source: When using the JetBrains WebStorm IDE, you may find that saving changed files does not trigger the watcher as you might expect. trans-unit.source: When using the old assets loaders (i.e. file-loader/url-loader/raw-loader) along with Asset Module in webpack 5, you might want to stop Asset Module from processing your assets again as that would result in asset duplication. This can be done by setting asset's module type to 'javascript/auto'.
trans-unit.target: 当在webpack 5中使用旧的资产加载器（即 file-loader / url-loader / raw-loader ）和Asset Module时，您可能希望停止Asset Module再次处理资产，因为这将导致资产重复。这可以通过将资产的模块类型设置为 'javascript/auto' 来完成。

trans-unit.source: When we import * as Upstream from 'upstream' this will actually resolve to the file in the browser property. The browser property takes precedence because it's the first item in mainFields. Meanwhile, a Node.js application bundled by webpack will first try to resolve using the file in the module field.
trans-unit.target: 当我们 import * as Upstream from 'upstream' 将*作为上游导入时，这实际上将解析为 browser 属性中的文件。该 browser 属性优先，因为它是第一项 mainFields 。同时，由webpack捆绑的Node.js应用程序将首先尝试使用 module 字段中的文件进行解析。

trans-unit.source: When webpack bundles your source code, it can become difficult to track down errors and warnings to their original location. For example, if you bundle three source files (a.js, b.js, and c.js) into one bundle (bundle.js) and one of the source files contains an error, the stack trace will simply point to bundle.js. This isn't always helpful as you probably want to know exactly which source file the error came from.
trans-unit.target: 当webpack捆绑您的源代码时，很难将错误和警告跟踪到其原始位置。例如，如果将三个源文件（ a.js ， b.js 和 c.js ）捆绑到一个捆绑包（ bundle.js ）中，并且其中一个源文件包含错误，则堆栈跟踪将仅指向 bundle.js 。这并不总是有用的，因为您可能想确切知道错误来自哪个源文件。

trans-unit.source: When webpack processes your application, it starts from a list of modules defined on the command line or in its config file. Starting from these entry points, webpack recursively builds a dependency graph that includes every module your application needs, then packages all of those modules into a small number of bundles - often, just one - to be loaded by the browser.
trans-unit.target: 当webpack处理您的应用程序时，它是从命令行或其配置文件中定义的模块列表开始的。从这些入口点开始，webpack递归地构建一个依赖关系图，其中包括您的应用程序需要的每个模块，然后将所有这些模块打包为少量的捆绑包 -通常只有一个捆绑包 -由浏览器加载。

trans-unit.source: When webpack processes your application, it starts from a list of modules defined on the command line or in its configuration file. Starting from these entry points, webpack recursively builds a dependency graph that includes every module your application needs, then bundles all of those modules into a small number of bundles - often, just one - to be loaded by the browser.
trans-unit.target: 当webpack处理您的应用程序时，它从命令行或其配置文件中定义的模块列表开始。从这些入口点开始，webpack递归地构建一个依赖关系图，其中包括您的应用程序需要的每个模块，然后将所有这些模块捆绑为少量的捆绑包（通常只有一个），以供浏览器加载。

trans-unit.source: Whether comments shall be extracted to a separate file, (see details). By default extract only comments using /^\**!|@preserve|@license|@cc_on/ regexp condition and remove remaining comments. If the original file is named foo.js, then the comments will be stored to foo.js.LICENSE. The terserOptions.output.comments option specifies whether the comment will be preserved, i.e. it is possible to preserve some comments (e.g. annotations) while extracting others or even preserving comments that have been extracted.
trans-unit.target: 是否将评论提取到单独的文件中（请参阅详细信息）。默认情况下，仅使用 /^\**!|@preserve|@license|@cc_on/ regexp条件提取注释，并删除其余注释。如果原始文件名为 foo.js ，则注释将存储到 foo.js.LICENSE 。该 terserOptions.output.comments 选项指定的评论是将被保留，也就是说，它是可能保存一些意见（如注释），而提取人甚至保存已提取的意见。

trans-unit.source: With Code Splitting, multiple child chunks of an entry chunk can have common dependencies. To prevent duplication these can be moved into the parent. This reduces overall size, but does have a negative effect on the initial load time. If it is expected that users will need to download many sibling chunks, i.e. children of the entry chunk, then this should improve load time overall.
trans-unit.target: 使用代码拆分，条目块的多个子块可以具有公共依赖性。为了防止重复，可以将它们移入父级。这样可以减小总体大小，但会对初始加载时间产生负面影响。如果预期用户将需要下载许多同级块，即条目块的子级，那么这将总体上改善加载时间。

trans-unit.source: You can set the dependency as eager inside the advanced API of Module Federation, which doesn’t put the modules in an async chunk, but provides them synchronously. This allows us to use these shared modules in the initial chunk. But be careful as all provided and fallback modules will always be downloaded. It’s recommended to provide it only at one point of your application, e.g. the shell.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在Module Federation的高级API中设置急切的依赖关系，它不会将模块放入异步块中，而是以同步方式提供它们。这使我们可以在初始块中使用这些共享模块。但是要小心，因为所有提供的和后备模块将始终被下载。建议仅在应用程序的某个位置（例如外壳）提供它。

trans-unit.source: You can set up HMR so that this process happens automatically, or you can choose to require user interaction for updates to occur.
trans-unit.target: 您可以设置HMR,使这一过程自动发生,或者您可以选择要求用户互动以发生更新。

trans-unit.source: You don't have to combine it with the mocha loader, it's independent. So if you want to cover a normal app usage, you can do so. The reportHtml function just appends the output to the body.
trans-unit.target: 您不必将其与Mocha加载程序结合使用，它是独立的。因此，如果您想涵盖正常的应用使用情况，则可以这样做。该 reportHtml 功能只是将输出追加到身体。

trans-unit.source: You have built an offline app using the Workbox project. You've started the journey of turning your web app into a PWA. You may now want to think about taking things further. A good resource to help you with that can be found here.
trans-unit.target: 您已经使用Workbox项目构建了一个脱机应用程序。您已经开始了将Web应用程序转换为PWA的旅程。您现在可能需要考虑将事情做得更远。在这里可以找到一个很好的资源来帮助您。

trans-unit.source: You may also extract the CSS based on the webpack entry name. This is especially useful if you import routes dynamically but want to keep your CSS bundled according to entry. This also prevents the CSS duplication issue one had with the ExtractTextPlugin.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以根据webpack的条目名来提取CSS。如果你想动态导入路由,但又想根据条目来保持CSS的捆绑,这一点特别有用。这也避免了使用ExtractTextPlugin时出现的CSS重复问题。

trans-unit.source: You may have noticed that index.html was created manually, even though it is now placed in the dist directory. Later on in this guide, we will generate index.html rather than edit it manually. Once this is done, it should be safe to empty the dist directory and to regenerate all the files within it.
trans-unit.target: 您可能已经注意到 index.html 是手动创建的，即使它现在已放置在 dist 目录中。在本指南的后面，我们将生成 index.html ,而不是手动编辑它。完成此操作后，清空 dist 目录并重新生成其中的所有文件应该是安全的。

trans-unit.source: You may have noticed that few webpack configurations look exactly alike. This is because webpack's configuration file is a JavaScript file that exports a webpack configuration. This configuration is then processed by webpack based upon its defined properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可能已经注意到，几乎没有Webpack配置看起来完全相同。这是因为webpack的配置文件是导出webpack配置的JavaScript文件。然后，webpack根据其定义的属性来处理此配置。

trans-unit.source: You may have noticed that few webpack configurations look exactly alike. This is because webpack's configuration file is a JavaScript file that exports an object. This object is then processed by webpack based upon its defined properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可能已经注意到，几乎没有Webpack配置看起来完全相同。这是因为webpack的配置文件是导出对象的JavaScript文件。然后，webpack根据其定义的属性处理该对象。

trans-unit.source: You may need to apply multiple shimming techniques to the same component.
trans-unit.target: 您可能需要对同一组件应用多种调光技术。

trans-unit.source: You may set name for a bundle using the name options parameter. See documentation.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 name options参数设置捆绑包的名称。请参阅文档。

trans-unit.source: You might be wondering how webpack and its plugins seem to "know" what files are being generated. The answer is in the manifest that webpack keeps to track how all the modules map to the output bundles. If you're interested in managing webpack's output in other ways, the manifest would be a good place to start.
trans-unit.target: 您可能想知道webpack及其插件似乎如何“知道”正在生成什么文件。答案在于清单，webpack一直跟踪所有模块如何映射到输出包。如果您有兴趣以其他方式管理webpack的 output ，清单将是一个不错的起点。

trans-unit.source: You must install both the google-closure-compiler package as well as the closure-webpack-plugin.
trans-unit.target: 你必须同时安装google-closure-compiler包以及closure-webpack-plugin。

trans-unit.source: You must load the generated chunk before the entry point:
trans-unit.target: 你必须在进入点之前加载生成的分块。

trans-unit.source: You must run the instrumentation as a post step
trans-unit.target: 您必须作为后步骤运行仪器设备

trans-unit.source: You need another option? Then you should think about:
trans-unit.target: 你需要另一种选择?那么你应该考虑一下。

trans-unit.target: 每个样式模块只需要一个默认导出

trans-unit.source: You need to have only one default export per style module.
trans-unit.target: 每个样式模块仅需要一个默认导出。

trans-unit.source: You should configure your server to disallow access to the Source Map file for normal users!
trans-unit.target: 你应该配置你的服务器,不允许普通用户访问源地图文件!

trans-unit.source: You should not deploy the Source Map file to the webserver. Instead only use it for error report tooling.
trans-unit.target: 你不应该将源地图文件部署到web服务器上。相反,仅将其用于错误报告工具。

trans-unit.source: You should not use HotModuleReplacementPlugin plugin if you are using a webpack-dev-server. webpack-dev-server enables / disables HMR using hot option.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是 webpack-dev-server ,则不应使用 HotModuleReplacementPlugin 插件。 webpack-dev-server 使用 hot 选项启用/禁用HMR 。

trans-unit.source: You should only care about them if you are building your own compiler based on webpack, or introspect the internals.
trans-unit.target: 只有在你基于webpack构建自己的编译器时,你才应该关心它们,或者反省一下内部结构。

trans-unit.source: You should tell the loader about all your locales, if you want to load them once and than want to use them synchronous.
trans-unit.target: 你应该告诉加载器你所有的locales,如果你想一次加载它们,然后同步使用它们。

trans-unit.source: You will be disrupted by this first issue. It is natural to expect relative references to be resolved against the .sass/.scss file in which they are specified (like in regular .css files).
trans-unit.target: 您将被第一个问题打扰。人们很自然地想到相关资料，对解决 .sass / .scss 在它们（在常规等指定文件 .css 文件）。

trans-unit.source: You will need to exclude them form babel-loader.
trans-unit.target: 您需要从 babel-loader 中排除它们。

trans-unit.source: You will see all generated code of a chunk in a single blob of code. This is the raw output file without any devtooling support
trans-unit.target: 你将会看到一个chunk的所有生成的代码都在一个单一的代码块中,这是一个没有任何devtool支持的原始输出文件。这是没有任何devtooling支持的原始输出文件。

trans-unit.source: You will see generated code after the preprocessing by loaders but before additional webpack transformations. Only source lines will be mapped and column information will be discarded resp. not generated. This prevents setting breakpoints in the middle of lines which doesn't work together with minimizer.
trans-unit.target: 你会看到经过加载器预处理后,但在额外的webpack转换之前生成的代码。只有源行会被映射,列信息会被丢弃,而不是生成。这可以防止在行的中间设置断点,因为断点不能和最小化器一起使用。

trans-unit.source: You will see the generated code, but each module is shown as separate code file in browser devtools.
trans-unit.target: 您将看到生成的代码,但每个模块在浏览器devtools中显示为单独的代码文件。

trans-unit.source: You will see the original code that you wrote, assuming all loaders support SourceMapping.
trans-unit.target: 你会看到你写的原始代码,假设所有加载器都支持SourceMapping。

trans-unit.source: You will see the original code that you wrote, assuming all loaders support SourceMapping. Only source lines will be mapped and column information will be discarded resp. not generated. This prevents setting breakpoints in the middle of lines which doesn't work together with minimizer.
